title: Process Driver Settlement
description: An owner-operator has completed several loads. A settlement specialist needs to process their pay.

tasks.description: Retrieve all completed and invoiced loads for a specific driver for the settlement period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all loads ready for payment.

tasks.description: Calculate the total revenue for the loads.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total linehaul revenue is correctly calculated.

tasks.description: Deduct standard items like fuel advances, insurance, and equipment rental fees.
Finalize the settlement and generate a statement for the driver, then schedule the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final net pay is calculated, and the payment is queued.
